name: Smash Mania
description:
CRASH AND SMASH!
Hack, hackle, cut, break, explode, SMASH everything in sight – in Smash Mania total destruction will be your aim!

Destroy various barriers and crash all on your way, using different weapons. Juicy fruits and expensive wines mustn’t stay on the shelves, smash them as soon as possible. Act like a shot in changeable game situations!

Incredible physics, tricky levels, bright graphics, unique gameplay – Smash Mania will become best buy for iOS this season!
Each level in Smash Mania demands reaction quickness and gives you a lot of pleasure and fun!

GAME FEATURES:
• 100 levels, 8 animated game locations with Gorgeous graphics
• Innovated and unique game mechanics
• Huge weapon choice: from knife and shuriken to bomb and anvil
• Fast and addictive gameplay
• GameCenter achievements and leaderboards
• iPhone 5 HD Graphics and iCloud Support
• New worlds and levels in further upgrades
